statements: DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND action_performed = 'login';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE authorized = FALSE AND action_performed = 'login';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND error_message LIKE '%permission denied%';
DELETE FROM access_attempts_details WHERE id = 100 AND attempt_id = 50;
DELETE FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND reason = 'Suspicious activity';
DELETE FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1' AND reason LIKE '%invalid%' AND user_id = '87654321-1234-5678-9123-456789123456';
